resources.string: Say up, down, left or right to indicate position of black space in the yellow circle, start by left side. You have 2 seconds for each circle.
To try recognition of digits: say something like one, two, three, four, five.
To try phonetic recognition say anything.
To try recognition of a weather forecast like sunny spells on Wednesday
"This is an eye test. It won't take few minutes. Click on the power button of your controller to start."
please move joystick left/right and validate with trigger button the position where you see only one circle
please move joystick up/down and validate with trigger button the position where you see the smallest circle with 4 gaps
please say up/down or say accept to validate the position where you see the smallest circle with 4 gaps
Do you see the circle with all 4 gaps?
"you will use the controller without the voice command"
you will use the voice command without the controller
"With joystick you choice the gap position you see. You will hear this bip when answer is recorded. Click the back button for hard end the test."
"you can say your answer after a bip. You will hear this voice 'next' if answer is recorded. Click the trigger button to get to the next image sizes, or say 'stop' for ending of test"
